attributes.action: Stop Courts ordering extortionate costs of more than 1000% for a disputed Loan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: the insolvancy agency appointed a trustee to confiscate my wifes assets after Blackwood Court Made her bankrupt without her Knowlage of proceedings the cost of Justice for her to date exeeds £17000 (approximatly three years income for myself or one and a half joint) for a disputed amount of around £1033?(don't know the actual amount since it has been witheld.I asked for evidence which was refused from the only partitioner, and Blackwood Court does not have to respond to the request for evidence of debt, therefore refuses to correspond. now she has had to borrow. to overturn a decision
